attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting to find a mentally and physically stimulating game such as subway surfers but I was utterly shocked to see a racist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic, islamophobic, sexist, misogynistic, pedophilic, white supremacist asking for my vote?! No way Jose. I swear I could smell the stench of white privilege and ignorance make its way throughout my house. The almost toxic vapors were becoming too much for me to bear and I sprinted outside for the first time in 10 years. This app is not only a threat to people mentally but it could also kill you. Do not download it is terrible and a waste of money and time and storage. Good bye.
